sub_title: Financial Management | General Management | Business Strategy Development | Budgeting and Forecasting | Financial Analysis & Modelling | Team Building and Retention | Risk Analysis and Mitigation
summary:
Leveraging 15+ years of expertise in managing all aspects of the Finance function, I am a strong Finance professional with vast experience of working as an expatriate in various locations in Africa and Asia. 

Proven leadership skills combined with team building ability and focus on achieving business excellence in all company Finance challenges whilst demonstrating strong knowledge of optimal financial standards, tax, and risk mitigation.

I define myself as a highly analytical and result-driven professional with a track-record of enhancing business performance by developing, directing and implementing financial and non-financial plans, reports, and budgets in line with business policies.

I have the ability to act as a challenging partner on an Executive and Senior Management level and have a can-do mentality geared towards success for the company.
